title: Force per unit length acting on two wires

content.prompt: Two long, straight, current-carrying wires are parallel to each other in the plane of the page and separated by a distance a, as shown above. The direction of the current I in each wire is toward the top of the page. Which of the following best represents the force per unit length acting on the wires?
